replies.body: I honestly feel like I wasted time trying to get gold to get a victorious skin now "mao" for real out of all the popular champions this season wtf
mao is good rofl
fuck mao I know hes a good champ but there were so maybe better choices

Bro, you're just complaining because your favourite champ or champ you play more frequently didn't get selected. People who do enjoy playing mao like me for instance would be delighted to have this skin. Anyway you should be happy that you get the Victorious skin, because there are people who would gladly take it from you who don't have the time you do to get the rewards. 
No crying {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

He's a tree.
He produces O2
He's more useful than you
end of story

i myself don't play maokai but still, he hasn't gotten a new skin in a while

i am bronze, my friend is diamon. so he do Invite and friend request flair for me. as result, i can get the victorious maokai skin. is it right ?
maokai is my main thank you so much riot

they should give ppl better rewards/more rewards for plats and diamonds. its kinda stupid when i grind so hard to diamond and you still get the same rewards as someone who is gold. just the border difference is not enough, and besides.. the diamond boarder looks ugly, i like the old version better, it looks way more unique. the current one now looks way too similar to silver boarder in terms of colours scheme and two white circles that doesnt even look like diamonds. pleasssse riot! it makes ppl want to work harder for better rank, not to mention happier for the rewards.

How about just being happy you made it?
The reward is the achievement, everything else is just a bunch of pointless pixels.
why Victorious is Maokai? we should have better choice!!!{{item:3147}}
Its not Mao its most likely Kindred as the shape of the the face is way too narrow fore mao
It says maokai ?

it clearly says victorious maokai lmfao
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

How can you hate on the selection. It's tops year. Mao at the start of the split was perma ban or picked. Ekko just got a new skin and Trundle was heavily flexed for support. the choice was more than valid (just note I dont play mao and would have like someone else but cant argue with what is)

Maokai?? thats interesting

A shorter preseason would be great
First time logging back in over 2 years and just reading through all the comments. Now 23 years old and I just think...interesting
Lets give League a shot again I think.
BRING RANKED BACK HIS YEAR RITO

so I had no bans or anything but because I got a suspension from afking a couple months ago I don't get rewards???

So if I had beend banned 3 times before August I get rewards but not if you even one ban after August??? What kind of system is that ?

Wouldn't it be cool if there was an option to select which Victorious Skin you unlock after consecutive seasons in Gold+... Got Maokai this year, which is sweet, but missed out on my favourite champion's Victorious skin last season... Bittersweet. It hurts.
come on, at least give a border for bronze to show that we're bad XD

awesome maokai skin had my account for years only played rank to try get maokai skin think i got lucky XP and to the haters maokai is my boi tank hard and root hard ahahah {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
